thread.title: Radamel Falcao Trolls Former Manchester United Teammate Ander Herrera On Instagram
thread.title_full: Radamel Falcao Trolls Former Manchester United Teammate Ander Herrera On Instagram

title: Radamel Falcao Trolls Former Manchester United Teammate Ander Herrera On Instagram

organizations.name: radamel falcao trolls former manchester united teammate ander herrera on instagram radamel falcao trolls former manchester united teammate ander herrera on instagram fri feb

text:
Radamel Falcao Trolls Former Manchester United Teammate Ander Herrera On Instagram Fri Feb 24 2017 11:08:07 GMT+0000 (GMT) Fri Feb 24 2017 11:08:07 GMT+0000 (GMT) Jack Kenmare Jack Kenmare in football 
Radamel Falcao recaptured glimpses of his former self on Tuesday night when he bagged a brace against Manchester City in the Champions League. 
It was definitely one of those 'sit back and appreciate' moments. 
Not only has the 31-year-old been in scintillating form on the pitch, scoring 21 goals in 26 games, but the forward has managed to produce on Instagram with a superb comment on Ander Herrera's latest picture. 
Despite never failing to kick on during his time at Old Trafford, many Manchester United fans were desperate to see the Colombian succeed and his work ethic was never doubted. 
Falcao was also a favourite among his teammates. 
Juan Mata was among a large group of players who posted on social media during his difficult spell after he scored just four goals and created only 16 chances in 24 Premier League appearances, at the time. - Juan Mata GarcÃ­a (@juanmata8) May 8, 2015 
When friend Antonio Valencia posted an image of him and teammate Ander Herrera on Instagram yesterday, the Colombian was quick to comment.Banter... A post shared by antoniovalencia2525 (@antoniovalencia2525) on Feb 23, 2017 at 7:56am PST 
Falcao commented on the post: "Ander the sun is free hahaha", referring to his pale skin complexion. 
It's great to see the former Manchester United and Chelsea striker back to his best. 
Keep up the good work, Radamel. Sponsored Links
